issue.title: [C++] Simplify IPC tests by using BufferOutputStreams
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8278](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8278). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The use of memory maps in these IPC tests adds developer overhead for each new test added. I'm not sure they add much. If we're concerned about zero-copy in reads, we can just as easily check for that with an in-memory buffer
